In patients without a cardiac history who are normotensive with a normal ECG, the', 'baseline ECHO should be done prior to Cycle 1 day 15 and is not mandated prior to randomisation.', '5) ECHOs are recommended to be repeated during cycle 5 and every 12 weeks thereafter whilst on treatment (ie. during', 'cycles 8, 11, 14 etc.) as per SmPC guidance.
